project.description:
IL Build job for centralboot image targets:
target=centralboot packaging=1
Copies artfacts from ci jobs: il_changeling_all, il_chos2, il_virtual, il_vtc, il_testmodule_contents
Then runs Centralboot to generate centralboot image and run reversion script to update the version info.

org.datadog.jenkins.plugins.datadog.Data.tagProperties: Environment=release-build EnvironmentShortName=relbld EnvironmentLevel=prod EnvironmentType=build Server=jenkins-rel JobSeverity=high Branch=$BRANCH_NAME STCVersion=$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BLL_BUILD_NUMBER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is used to pass a common build number to all IL and BLL build jobs run during the nightly build process.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
env
# TEMP -- echo Clean up prior to extracting tarballs
# make the version file writeable # TEMP -- sudo chmod 777 $WORKSPACE/build/il/version
# need to remove information in repos directory and packages directory # TEMP -- sudo -S rm -rf $WORKSPACE/build/il/repos/* # TEMP -- sudo -S rm -rf $WORKSPACE/build/il/packages/*
# TEMP -- sudo scons target=packageclean # TEMP -- sudo scons target=kernelclean
# TEMP -- rm -f $WORKSPACE/*.txt

# remove files using sudo for files that may be # owned by root if [[ $P4CLEANWORKSPACE = "true" ]]; then sudo rm -rf $WORKSPACE/ echo 3LoQdl*vYiz3| p4 -p perforce.spirentcom.com:1666 -u scmbuild login p4 -c jenkins-${NODE_NAME}-${JOB_NAME}-${BRANCH_NAME} -p perforce.spirentcom.com:1666 -u scmbuild sync //jenkins-${NODE_NAME}-${JOB_NAME}-${BRANCH_NAME}/...#none fi
